title: 15 dogs found homes this month
description: thanks to our amazing community, we successfully placed 15 dogs into loving families during january.

title: bella's success story
description: after 8 months in our care, bella found her perfect family. she now enjoys daily walks and has a backyard to play in.

title: new partnership with local vet clinic
description: we've partnered with downtown veterinary clinic to provide better healthcare for all our rescue dogs.

title: fundraising goal achieved
description: we reached our $10,000 fundraising goal ahead of schedule, enabling us to expand our rescue capacity.

title: volunteer appreciation event
description: celebrating our incredible volunteers who make our mission possible. their dedication continues to inspire us.
